hero.title: Hello, I'm {name}
hero.description: Web developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate developer with over {years} years of experience creating modern web applications and innovative digital solutions. I specialize in technologies such as React, Node.js, and modern databases.
about.description2: My focus is on writing clean code, creating intuitive interfaces, and solving complex problems efficiently. I am always learning new technologies and improving my skills.
about.description3: When I'm not coding, I enjoy reading books, contributing to open-source projects, and sharing knowledge with the community.
about.tag1Description: Clean and efficient code with best practices.
about.tag2Description: Attractive and functional designs that enhance user experience.
about.tag3Description: Performance optimization for fast and responsive applications.
